code:
import axios from'axios';// Для production - относительные пути
const API_BASE_URL='/api';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_BASE_URL,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});// Add token to requests
api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;});// Profiles - ОДНА функция getProfiles
export const getProfiles=async function(){let filters=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};const response=await api.get('/profiles/',{params:{page:filters.page||1,page_size:filters.page_size||12,game:filters.game,sort_by:filters.sortBy,search:filters.search,rank:filters.rank,has_achievements:filters.achievements}});return response.data;};export const getProfile=async id=>{const response=await api.get("/profiles/".concat(id,"/"));return response.data;};// Games
export const getGames=async()=>{const response=await api.get('/games/');return response.data;};// Posts
export const getPosts=async userId=>{const response=await api.get('/posts/',{params:{author:userId}});return response.data;};export const createPost=async postData=>{const response=await api.post('/posts/',postData);return response.data;};export const updatePost=async(id,postData)=>{const response=await api.put("/posts/".concat(id,"/"),postData);return response.data;};export const deletePost=async id=>{const response=await api.delete("/posts/".concat(id,"/"));return response.data;};// Subscriptions
export const getSubscriptionPlans=async userId=>{const response=await api.get('/subscription-plans/',{params:{author:userId}});return response.data;};// User Games
export const getUserGames=async userId=>{const response=await api.get('/user-games/',{params:{user:userId}});return response.data;};export default api;
